TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_bakici, title = bakici, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/bakici} }

S.FORM: == bakici == 水桶 / sapidadum ita ku bakici. siwkay nu bakici u bakici sa, sapilacul tu nanum saca tuutuud. u kamu nu Sakizaya "bakici", namakay Amilika a kamu "bucket". matenes misaungay nu tademaw. anu miculu' ku canacanan ,bakici sa u kapahay a sakaluk. itawya i niyazu', inayi' henay ku cilaisui , sapidadum ku nayazu'ay. tinaku a kamu sibakici 帶水桶 / sibakici kaku midadum. sibakiciay 帶水桶的 / ciniza dada' ku sibakiciay. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika A bucket or pail is typically a watertight, vertical cylinder or truncated cone, with an open top and a flat bottom, attached to a semicircular carrying handle called the bail.

== bakici == 水桶 / sapidadom ita ko bakici. siwkay no bakici o bakici sa, sapilacol to nanom saca tootood. o kamo no Sakizaya "bakici", namakay Amilika a kamo "bocket". matenes misaongay no tademaw. ano micolo' ko canacanan ,bakici sa o kapahay a sakalok. itawya i niyazo', inayi' henay ko cilaisoi , sapidadom ko nayazo'ay. tinako a kamo sibakici 帶水桶 / sibakici kako midadom. sibakiciay 帶水桶的 / ciniza dada' ko sibakiciay. o solit no Holam ato Amilika A bocket or pail is typically a watertight, vertical cylinder or troncated cone, with an open top and a flat bottom, attached to a semicircolar carrying handle called the bail.
